name: Wolf's Hill
description: One day Martians sent robots to Earth to destroy the harmony of the life. Roberts spread caterpillars, and they ate all the leaves, and the trees died. The catastrophe has begun.  One wolf decided to defeat Martians, he started to eat all the butterflies  to stop reproducing of the caterpillars. He is strong in his intention... but he has to avoid meeting robots. Fight as wolf
